TV Sitcoms & Comedy Shows.name: Golden Age Giggles
TV Sitcoms & Comedy Shows.description: Test your knowledge of classic sitcoms and iconic comedy shows from television's golden age. From 'Happy Days' spin-offs to network abbreviations, this quiz covers a wide range of familiar faces and moments. Are you a true fan of these timeless shows?

questions.text: Which of these television programs did not feature characters introduced on 'Happy Days'?
What is the star of the TV show 'Everybody Loves Raymond'?
In what city is TV's 'The Mary Tyler Moore Show' set?
In the television network abbreviation 'ABC' what does the 'A' stand for?
What is Delta Burke's character's job on the sitcom 'Designing Women'?

TV Sitcoms & Comedy Shows.name: Seinfeld & Beyond
TV Sitcoms & Comedy Shows.description: Dive into the quirky world of 'Seinfeld' and other beloved sitcoms. This quiz explores memorable moments and characters from shows that defined a generation of comedy. Can you recall the details of these hilarious television experiences?

questions.text: On TV's 'Seinfeld' what type of doctor did Mr. Costanza go to when he sat on 'fusilli Jerry'?
Which of the boys on the TV show 'My Three Sons' is adopted?
What character did Woody replace on the TV show 'Cheers'?
